title: Meeting Mode
summary: Silence phone during appointments, or for a fixed time. Great with Android Wear!
developerAddress:
IRIS Innovations
234 Graham St., Ste 201
Sewickley, PA 15143
description: Half-price introduction, price will go up with next revision!Ever silence your phone for a meeting, or a show, then forget to turn the ringer back on and miss important calls?Activate Meeting Mode from your phone or Android Wear watch, it will give you a list of possible calendar events and time intervals to choose from. Tap one and your phone is silenced, but will automatically un-mute when the appointment or time period is over!Optionally gives a short vibration to let you know when it's no longer in silent mode.Android Wear users can activate by voice command or tap and select from a watch-optimized menu of appointments and time periods. When active, a notification is shown on both the watch and phone, letting you cancel and un-mute quickly, or see details on the phone.
descriptionHTML:
Half-price introduction, price will go up with next revision!

Ever silence your phone for a meeting, or a show, then forget to turn the ringer back on and miss important calls?
Activate Meeting Mode from your phone or Android Wear watch, it will give you a list of possible calendar events and time intervals to choose from. Tap one and your phone is silenced, but will automatically un-mute when the appointment or time period is over!

Optionally gives a short vibration to let you know when it's no longer in silent mode.

Android Wear users can activate by voice command or tap and select from a watch-optimized menu of appointments and time periods. When active, a notification is shown on both the watch and phone, letting you cancel and un-mute quickly, or see details on the phone.
comments: Great idea, works great Fixed issue
Simple, Fast, & Very Handy! Perfect function for an android watch too!
recentChanges: + Fixed bug when aborting activation from smartwatch
